summary: Bug 1: removed hook-level onError handlers in useManageHolidays and usePurchaseSubscription to avoid duplicate toasts when call-level onError is provided. Bug 2: refactored AvailabilityCalendar to track checked dates via ref and adjusted effect deps; lint now clean.
current_status: Beauty vendor hooks and AvailabilityCalendar updated; scoped lint passes; global lint warnings elsewhere remain unchanged.
